com.dam_industries.dbaccess

Class HelperClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dam_industries.dbaccess.HelperClass

  • public class HelperClass
extends Object
    HelperClass is a retrieval class meant to assist with retrieving records from a database and converting them into ArrayLists.

    This class has been synchronized to the database connection object to allow multithreading.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Moore

    • Method Detail

      • getRecords

        public static ArrayList<String> getRecords(String absTablePath,
                           String column)
                                    throws SQLException
        Returns all records from the specified database.table in column 2 as ArrayList of type String.

        Synchronized on the database connection object.

        Parameters:
        absTablePath - The absolute database.table path to requested
        column - The column going to be pulled
        Returns:
        ArrayList An ArrayList of Strings of all records in the table of the specified path
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        ArrayList, PreparedStatement, ResultSet

      • getDistinct

        public static ArrayList<String> getDistinct(String absTablePath,
                            String column)
                                     throws SQLException
        Returns ArrayList of type String of distinct values in table and column specified.

        Synchronized on the database connection object.

        Parameters:
        absTablePath - The absolute database.table path
        column - The column header for the row returned as distinct
        Returns:
        getEncountered An array of distinct records in column
        Throws:
        SQLException
        See Also:
        ArrayList, PreparedStatement, ResultSet
